price: (102) Then if we only had a return [to the world] and could be of the believers..."[1053]
arabic: فَلَوۡ أَنَّ لَنَا كَرَّةٗ فَنَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ
footnotes: [1053]- The conclusion of this verse is estimated as "...we would do this or that."

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: falaw anna lanā karratan fanakūna mina al-mu'minīna
